movies.title: The Dacians
movies.plot: The great King of Dacia, Decebal (Decebalus), is ready to make the ultimate sacrifice in order to keep the integrity of his people. His own son, Cotyso, is given to the god Zamolxis to the dismay of the King and his daughter Meda. Septimius Severus a young roman devoted to his adopted country, must make the choice between his blood origins and the culture he was raised in.
movies.simplePlot: The Dacian kingdom lies at the eastern border of the Roman Empire.Only the river Danube separates the two mortal enemies.The Dacian king Decebalus knows that soon the vastly superior Roman legions will cross the river and attack Dacia.

biography.bio: Pierre Brice was born on 6 February 1929 in Brest, France. After enlisting as volunteer to the French Army and fighting in Indochina, he attended acting lessons and got a first small role in Ça va barder (1955). In 1962, the German producer Horst Wendlandt searched for an actor who should play the Native American chief Winnetou on a Western movie adapted from novels by Karl May and got to know Brice at the Berlin Film Festival. He got the role and portrayed "Winnetou" in ten more movies with his co-star Lex Barker as "Old Shatterhand". These very successful productions made him a superstar in Germany, winning several awards such as Bambi or the Golden Otto of teenager magazine "Bravo". Although appearing on countless other movies and TV shows, he will always be best remembered as "Winnetou", whom he also played at the Bad Segeberg open air theater.
biography.name: Pierre Brice

biography.bio: Marie-José Nat was born on April 22, 1940 in Bonifacio, Corse, France as Marie-Jose Benhalassa. She is an actress, known for Train of Life (1998), Litan (1982) and The Dacians (1966). She was previously married to Michel Drach and Roger Dumas.
biography.name: Marie-José Nat

biography.bio: Georges Marchal was one of the most important lead actors in French cinema in the '50s, together with Jean Marais. He was the lead in various costume dramas and swashbuckling films before taking part in some of the films of Luis Buñuel, a close friend of his. He retired in 1989.
biography.name: Georges Marchal

biography.bio: Amza Pellea was born on April 7, 1931 in Bailesti, Dolj, Romania. He was an actor and writer, known for Michael the Brave (1970), Uncle Marin, the Billionaire (1979) and The Punishment (1976). He died on December 12, 1983 in Bucharest, Romania.
biography.name: Amza Pellea

biography.bio: Mircea Albulescu was born on October 4, 1934 in Bucharest, Romania as Iorgu Constantin Albulescu. He was an actor, known for Actorul si salbaticii (1975), Michael the Brave (1970) and For Motherland (1977). He was married to Maria. He died on April 8, 2016 in Bucharest.
biography.name: Mircea Albulescu

biography.bio: Alexandru Herescu is an actor, known for Michael the Brave (1970), The Dacians (1966) and Dragostea începe vineri (1974).
biography.name: Alexandru Herescu

biography.bio: György Kovács was born on February 22, 1910 in Kolozsvár, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for Michael the Brave (1970), Forest of the Hanged (1965) and Pistruiatul (1973). He died on November 9, 1977 in Bucharest, Romania.
biography.name: György Kovács

biography.bio: Ion Apahideanu is known for his work on Michael the Brave (1970), Un comisar acuzã (1974) and The Dacians (1966).
biography.name: Ion Apahideanu

biography.bio: Leopoldina Balanuta was born on December 10, 1934 in Paulesti, Vrancea County, Romania. She was an actress, known for Stone Wedding (1973), The Oak (1992) and Dincolo de pod (1977). She died on October 14, 1998 in Bucharest, Romania.
biography.name: Leopoldina Balanuta

biography.bio: Ion Banica is an actor, known for The Dacians (1966).
biography.name: Ion Banica

biography.bio: Geo Barton was born on March 23, 1912 in Piatra Neamt, Neamt, Romania. He was an actor, known for Le moulin de la chance (1957), Secvente (1982) and Calea Victoriei sau cheia visurilor (1965). He died on June 10, 1982 in Bucharest, Romania.
biography.name: Geo Barton

biography.bio: Ion Besoiu was born on March 11, 1931 in Sibiu, Sibiu, Romania. He was an actor, known for Michael the Brave (1970), Bucharest Non Stop (2015) and Toate pînzele sus (1976). He died on January 18, 2017 in Bucharest, Romania.
biography.name: Ion Besoiu

biography.bio: Ion Birá is an actor, known for The Dacians (1966).
biography.name: Ion Birá

biography.bio: Florin Blanarescu is an actor, known for Michael the Brave (1970), Bijuterii de familie (1958) and The Dacians (1966).
biography.name: Florin Blanarescu

biography.bio: Anatol Bogdan is an actor, known for The Dacians (1966).
biography.name: Anatol Bogdan
